description: Enable Application Signals for EC2 Python Flask application
validation_rubric: CloudWatchAgentServerPolicy IAM managed policy is attached to the EC2 instance role in the CDK stack
aws-opentelemetry-distro Python package is added to the project's dependency specification (check requirements.txt, pyproject.toml, or Dockerfile pip install commands)
If the application uses Docker, verify the Dockerfile includes aws-opentelemetry-distro installation
Modified files have no syntax errors (TypeScript, Python, YAML, JSON, etc.)
Existing code is preserved with no major unintended deletions or breaking changes
